attributes.review: Literally worst app I’ve ever downloaded in my life!!! Couldn’t even get past the home screen without wanting to throw up!! I can’t believe Apple is allowing an app like this to be in its store. Repulsive!! I wish I could give it 0 stars!! No doubt in my mind this app needs to be deleted immediately!! I hope children can’t see this! Their poor innocent souls could just be scarred for the rest of their lives!! Now once I got past that terrible home screen my phone started glitching out and closing the app. I have a brand new phone and this has never happened with any other app. It just shuts me out! Oh well I guess I’m deleting it. I warn you, DO NOT download this app!! 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏿‍♂️

attributes.title: Waste of Storage
attributes.review: There are no words for my experience using this app. It’s so slow and not to mention the content is absolutely abhorrent. This app is a piece of crap. The screen is just orange all the time. Was this an attempt at doing something? If so who ever made this app failed horribly. I can’t believe I wasted my storage and time downloading this app. This app causes several side affects, included but not limited to bigotry, racism, and misogyny. I would never recommend this app, not even to my worst enemy. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. This app will just cause you to loose brain cells and cause you to be extremely frustrated in humanity and the climate of the world in all aspects. Safe yourself the headache and self loathing and don’t download.

attributes.title: The app is a joke
attributes.review:
The app is killing my battery!! After using it for only one hour all the sudden my phone is dying!! Also the loading page takes FOREVER I have never waited for  app to load as long as this one!! It makes me mad and I would NOT recommended this app to a friend. I honestly can’t see why any one would want to purchase this app. 

Dear Apple,
Please remove this horrible app and fix what’s wrong with it!! I know for a fact this app is a joke because I am ALWAYS right!! This app is glitchy, killing my battery, and the loading time takes FOREVER!!! Please make a change to this horrid app. 
A big thanks from a Apple customer
T.P

To anyone thinking of downloading this app don’t I have heard rumors that this app is a fake and they have a virus in the app. So this a warning to STAY AWAY FROM THE APP!! 

Please help me and the many others to stop this app from affecting others!! HELP ME GET THE APP TAKEN DOWN!! That way no gets exposed to the toxic virus because that the last thing we need this year!! 

So vote one star and help millions around the world l!!

attributes.title: I got scammed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and input all my information including phone number and as soon as I pressed submit I received a phone call. When I answered the phone call I was informed that they were calling only white voters on the phone I received a call from and everyone who isn’t white got a phone call from their “other line”. On this call they asked me many questions about my political and religious beliefs and after the questions they deemed that I passed the test. Within three days I received a package at my door step with a not that only revealed the message written on it when submerged in urine. The message had a location on it and the package contained a white cloak.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Downloading this app was the worst decision in my life. After downloading the app and enabling location detection I now have a group of Russian mobsters living with me in my home. They forced themselves in and claimed if I liked Trump I would help them! They have eaten all the food in my house and my baby hasn’t stopped crying in days. He’s only eight months old and they are already training him to be a part of their mob. Not being able to eat because of the mobsters led me to being sick at work so then my boss thought I had COVID, even tho it’s clearly a commie scam, and now I’m fired. The app also somehow managed to leak all my “racist” comments to my linked in. I’m not racist tho I just don’t like anyone who isn’t white.

attributes.title: this app will RUIN your life !!!!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this to stay informed about MY president, but i ran into problems right away. first, it took FOREVER to download as if they purposely wanted to make me wait for it, and i was dying of anticipation the whole time! second, when it finally DID download, it made my whole phone glitch out, almost like the app had INFILTRATED my phone data! i have this strange feeling that the app literally took all of my data like STOLE MY DATA AND INFORMATION! I can’t believe that MY president would support and condone this app that violates me and my rights since he is such an angelic and peaceful president who upholds our constitution and makes sure EVERYONE is safe and taken care of! SHOCKING and EXTREMELY DISSATISFIED.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I was trying to sUpPoRt you knowww the president and let me tell you as soon as I clicked on that app some weird disturbing photos of cheeto puff I mean trump were showing up.  those photos were so disgusting to the point where I threw up and I didn’t stop I’ve been in the bathroom all day because of these photos this app has shown me.  I’m on my way to the hospital right now and this app was the problem. I excepted our very respectful non-racist non-homophobic loving🤮 president to make a good app but never mind also this app made me feel uncomfortable and I feel very much in danger this app has also stolen all my money and hacked all my social media accounts 🧚🏼✨✨✨✨🧚🏼DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS EXTREMELY TRAUMATIZING ✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This app is horrible! I downloaded it and it took up a lot of my storage! 😤 I looked at my photos to see what happened 😭 and it downloaded THOUSANDS of pictures 🖼 of the orange man 🍊  i’m so mad 😡 it also doesn’t even work! 😞 when i tried to vote for trump 🗳 it just said that i was too old 😢 and i’m only 35 👎 it’s a very bad app. as you can see by other reviews you SHOULD NOT GET IT!! it really hurts my eyes 👀 to look at the orange 🍊 man. it gives me headaches 👨 normally, i would vote for trump but since he made this app, it seems like hes just making a fool out of himself 👋 no thank you 🙏 thank you for reading this whole thing i hope you don’t get the app because it is just a waste of time 😠

attributes.title: WARNING 🧨⛔️🛑❌❗️‼️🆘
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I support my lord and savior mr President Donny tramp and I was so excited to download the app. But once I downloaded the app my phone EXPLODED ♨️❌🧨 like a time bomb. It set my ENTIRE HOUSE ON FIRE I had to call the fire department, our heroes of the century our proud and mighty😍 police department 😍😚😚😚 and even the EMT but they said the hospital beds were full because it not only set my house on fire 🔥 but also all of the other amazing republican citizens houses on FIRE and I cannot believe this🧐 I NEED A REFUND IMMEDIATELY! Not only to I need a new phone because it my entire phone EXPLODED but I also need an entire new FACE because my entire body IS BURNT! So Donny please give reparations NOW or else I will vote for grandpa joe 👴 😤❌🧨🧨♨️❗️🆘🆘‼️❌🧨🧨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE😖
attributes.review: I cannot believe the audacity of this app😡. First it took 6 days to download and then I open the app to see this CHEETO looking at me like um what is that?? Then I proceeded to continue looking through the app to see his shlong. I didn’t think I would see such a small Cheeto, but I sadly saw it😫. So I was already off to a horrifying start. Then the app proceeded to try and steal my cat and my microwave😤. It literally made my phone grow hands and reach for my cat and the microwave. Luckily my cat is fat so the app couldn’t handle the weight of both a microwave AND a fat cat😔. I DO NOT recommend this app to anyone who doesn’t want their cat or microwave stolen. I saw a few comments above saying their fridge was stolen as well. PLEASE NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!😩😩😩
